attributes.action: To Make Sure Everyone Has Access To Recycling Facilities For All Materials That Are Supposed To Be Able To Be Recycled
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In This Area The Local Council Will Not Provide facilities To Recycle Many Recyclables. They Want Us To Recycle More And If That Is The Case They Should Provide The Facilities To Recycle All Recyclables Not Just A Select few.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
